mod.name: The Vixen
mod.credits:
solderist.park's "The Cursed" mod, that gave me a good idea of how to structure the project itself.
Blurred_Aspect for testing it to its limits.
Vex'd for just being Vex.
All the fine people that bothered playing this and gave me feedback. Thanks, guys~
mod.description:
Adds Braixen as a playable character (automatically unlocks Ascension up to 15).
Adds one custom event to all eventpools, limited to the vixen unless you change it in the config.
Also adds one custom act 3 boss that is disabled by default. (see config for more details)
The main mechanics are temporary damagebuffs, debuff manipulation and self-inflicted damage on enemies.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw a card.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw a card.

cards.name: Ember
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 4 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Ember+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 5 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 2 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 3 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Sunny Day
cards.description:
Gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
thevixenmod:Sunny and debuffed: Reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.

cards.name: Sunny Day+
cards.description:
Gain 2 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
thevixenmod:Sunny and debuffed: Gain [E] and
reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.

cards.name: Debug
cards.description: For Dev Purposes

cards.name: Debug+
cards.description: For Dev Purposes

cards.name: Calm Mind
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Gain 3 Strength and Dexterity this turn.

cards.name: Calm Mind+
cards.description:

Retain your thevixenmod:rightmost attack, skill or power.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:

cards.name: Confusion

cards.name: Confusion+

thevixenmod:Sunny: Repeat this effect once.

cards.name: Counter Attack Dash Cancel
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Counter Attack Dash Cancel+

Gain 11 Block.

cards.name: Extrasensory
cards.description:
Target enemy deals
8 damage to itself
2 times.

Target enemy deals
8 damage to itself
3 times.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
!MISC! times instead.

cards.name: Facade
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Repeat this for every unique thevixenmod:debuff on you.
( !DBNUM! )

cards.name: Facade+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Repeat this for every unique thevixenmod:debuff on you.
( !DBNUM! )
thevixenmod:Sunny:
Unaffected by Weak.

cards.name: Fire Fang
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage !MISC! times.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Apply 4 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Fire Fang+
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Apply 6 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Flame Burst

Otherwise, gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

cards.name: Flame Burst+

cards.name: Flame Charge
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.

cards.name: Flame Charge+
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain 5 Dexterity this turn.

cards.name: Flame Wheel

cards.name: Flamethrower
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.

Retain your thevixenmod:rightmost attack, skill or power.

cards.name: Flamethrower+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage
Apply 3 thevixenmod:Burn.
thevixenmod:Sunny:
Retain your thevixenmod:rightmost attack, skill or power.

cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Flare Blitz+
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable to yourself.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Increase damage dealt by 5.

cards.name: Heat Wave
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 2 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Heat Wave+

Deal 11 damage to all enemies.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 3 thevixenmod:Burn.

cards.name: Lava Plume

Deal 3 damage 3 times to a random enemy.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 2 thevixenmod:Burn to each target hit.

cards.name: Lava Plume+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage 4 times to a random enemy.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Apply 2 thevixenmod:Burn to each target hit.

cards.name: Overheat+

cards.name: Protect

Gain 11 Block.

Protect becomes 33 % less effective for each stack of thevixenmod:Protectspam.

cards.name: Protect+
cards.description:

Gain 1 thevixenmod:Protectspam.
Protect becomes 25 % less effective for each stack of thevixenmod:Protectspam.

cards.name: Psybeam
cards.description:
Target enemy deals
7 damage to itself.

cards.name: Psybeam+

11 damage to itself.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain Block equal to the damage dealt.

cards.name: Swagger
cards.description:

7 damage to itself.
Until the start of your turn, it gains 3 Strength and takes damage equal to half its damage dealt.

cards.name: Swagger+

Target enemy deals
10 damage to itself.

cards.name: Tail Whip

Apply !MISC! Vulnerable.

Apply 4 thevixenmod:Burn.
Gain [E]

cards.name: Tail Whip+
cards.description:
Apply !MISC! Vulnerable.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Apply 4 thevixenmod:Burn.
Gain [E]

cards.name: Agility

cards.name: Agility+

Gain 14 Block.

Increase Block gained by 30 % and
gain !B2! Block next turn.

cards.name: Amnesia+
cards.description:
Gain 19 Block.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Increase Block gained by 30 % and
gain !B2! Block next turn.

cards.name: Analytic
cards.description: Whenever you play 2 or less cards in a turn, gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

cards.name: Analytic+

cards.name: Barrier

Gain 5 Block X times this turn and next turn.

cards.name: Barrier+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block X times this turn and next turn.
Apply 2 Frail to yourself.

cards.name: Blaze

cards.name: Blaze+

Gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Confuse Ray
cards.description:
Target enemy deals
4 damage to itself
2 times.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Enemy takes damage equal to half its damage dealt next turn.

cards.name: Confuse Ray+
cards.description:
Target enemy deals
4 damage to itself
3 times.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Enemy takes damage equal to half its damage dealt next turn.

cards.name: Curse
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable
to yourself.

cards.name: Curse+

Apply 3 Vulnerable
to yourself.

cards.name: Dazzling
cards.description: Whenever a card's thevixenmod:Sunny effect is triggered, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Dazzling+

Whenever a card's thevixenmod:Sunny effect is triggered, gain 2 Block.
Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

cards.name: Defiant

cards.name: Defiant+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain 1 thevixenmod:Defiant.

cards.name: Disable

cards.name: Double Team

Unaffected by Frail.

cards.name: Double Team+
cards.description:

cards.name: Fire Punch+1

cards.name: Fire Spin+

thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain [E]

cards.name: Hypnosis+

thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain [E]

cards.name: Incinerate+

cards.description:

cards.name: Light Screen+

cards.name: Magic Coat

( !MISC! extra Block for each thevixenmod:debuff above the limit)

cards.name: Magic Coat+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Costs up to 3 [E] less for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ).
( !MISC! extra Block for each thevixenmod:debuff above the limit)

cards.name: Mind Reader
cards.description:

cards.name: Mind Reader+

thevixenmod:Sunny: Inflict 3 Weak¹ or Vulnerable² respectively.

cards.name: Nasty Plot
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain [E]

cards.name: Nasty Plot+
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
thevixenmod:Sunny: gain [E].

cards.name: Perish Song

cards.name: Perish Song+

cards.name: Psychic
cards.description:
All enemies deal 14 damage to themselves.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Gain Block equal to their combined thevixenmod:Burn and Strength.

cards.name: Psychic+
cards.description:
All enemies deal 19 damage to themselves.

cards.name: Psyshock
cards.description:
Target enemy deals 7 damage to itself X times.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Psyshock+
cards.description:
Target enemy deals 7 damage to itself X+1 times.
Gain X+1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Refresh
cards.description:
Draw a card for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you
( !DBNUM! )
then reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.

cards.name: Refresh+
cards.description:
Draw a card and gain
1 temporary HP for each unique thevixenmod:debuff on you ( !DBNUM! ),
then reduce the number on all numbered debuffs on you by !MISC!.

cards.name: Shadow Ball
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.

draw 1 card.

cards.name: Shadow Ball+

( !DBCD! )

cards.name: Telepathy

cards.name: Telepathy+

cards.name: Trick Room+

cards.name: Trump Card
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.

cards.name: Trump Card+

If you have a thevixenmod:debuff on you, the damage dealt is applied to all other enemies.

cards.name: Will-O-Wisp
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny (if possible):
Apply it to all enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Will-O-Wisp+
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny (if possible):
Apply it to all enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wish
cards.description:
At the start of your next turn, heal for half the hp you lose this turn and gain temporary_HP equal to half the blocked damage you took plus half your surplus Block.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wish+
cards.description:
At the start of your next turn, heal for half the hp you lose this turn and gain temporary_HP equal to half the blocked damage you took plus half your surplus Block.
Heal 5 HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Burn Up
cards.description:
Consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
Draw a card and gain [E] for each stack ( !SUN! ). Exhaust.

cards.name: Burn Up+
cards.description:
Consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
Draw a card and gain [E] for each stack ( !SUN! ), then gain 2 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day. Exhaust.

cards.name: Clear Sky
cards.description:
thevixenmod:Sunny_Day is not consumed this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Clear Sky+
cards.description:
Gain 3 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Day is not consumed this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Copycat
cards.description:
Repeat the last card you played.
Exhaust.
thevixenmod:Sunny:
Shuffle a copy of it into your discard pile.

cards.name: Copycat+
cards.description:
Repeat the last card you played. It costs 1.
Exhaust.
thevixenmod:Sunny:
Shuffle a copy of it into your discard pile.

cards.name: Endure
cards.description:
Gain 14 Block.
thevixenmod:Sunny: You cannot die this turn, exhaust this card if you would.

cards.name: Endure+
cards.description:
Gain 18 Block.
You cannot die this turn, exhaust this card if you would.

cards.name: Future Sight
cards.description:
Play a card from your draw pile.
thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Play up to X cards from your draw pile.

cards.name: Future Sight+
cards.description:

thevixenmod:Sunny_Exhaust:
Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, then play up to X cards from it.

cards.name: Guts
cards.description:
Gain 2 thevixenmod:Guts.
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs.

cards.name: Guts+
cards.description:
Gain 5 thevixenmod:Guts.
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to the thevixenmod:cumulative_stacks of your thevixenmod:debuffs.

cards.name: Hex
cards.description: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the cumulative stacks of its debuffs (burn stacks only once), times the amount of unique debuffs on them.

cards.name: Hex+
cards.description: Deal damage to an enemy equal to the cumulative stacks of its debuffs (burn stacks only once), times the amount of unique debuffs + 1 on them.

cards.name: Inferno
cards.description:
Deal damage to all enemies equal to the target's thevixenmod:Burn.
Next turn, the target receives a thevixenmod:Burn equal to the thevixenmod:Burn it has now.
thevixenmod:Not_Sunny: Exhaust.

cards.name: Inferno+
cards.description:
Deal damage to all enemies equal to the target's thevixenmod:Burn.
Next turn, the target receives a thevixenmod:Burn equal to the thevixenmod:Burn it has now.
thevixenmod:Not_Sunny: Exhaust.

cards.name: Magician
cards.description:
Until end of turn, whenever YOU deal damage, draw a card, gain [E] and temporarily lose 2 Strength and Dexterity.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Magician+
cards.description:
Until end of turn, whenever YOU deal damage, draw a card, gain [E] and temporarily lose 1 Strength and Dexterity.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Moody
cards.description: NCByYW5k thevixenmod:b20gZ29vZCBlZmZ lY3RzIG thevixenmod:FuZC Ay IGJhZCBvbmVz

cards.name: Moody+
cards.description: NiByYW5k b20gZ29vZCBlZmZ lY3RzIG FuZC Az thevixenmod:IGJhZCBvbmVz

cards.name: Mystical Fire
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Apply 2 thevixenmod:Burn.
thevixenmod:Not_Sunny:
Shuffle this card into your drawpile.
thevixenmod:Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

cards.name: Mystical Fire+
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage twice.
Apply 3 thevixenmod:Burn.
thevixenmod:Not_Sunny:
Put this card on top of your drawpile.
thevixenmod:Gain !MISC! thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.

cards.name: Psych Up
cards.description:
Gain Strength and Block equal to the Strength and Block of target enemy this turn.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Psycho Shift
cards.description:
Absorb all Vulnerable and Weak from one enemy.

Exhaust.

cards.name: Psycho Shift+

Exhaust.

cards.name: Safeguard
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Gain 2 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day and !MISC! Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Safeguard+
cards.description:
Gain 20 Block.
Gain 2 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day and !MISC! Artifact.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Snatch+
cards.description:
Steal target enemy's Strength and Block until end of turn.
thevixenmod:Sunny: Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solar Beam
cards.description:
Consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
Deal 12 damage to all enemies for each stack consumed ( !SUN! ).

cards.name: Solar Beam+
cards.description:
Gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day, then consume all your thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
Deal 12 damage to all enemies for each stack consumed ( !SUN! ).

cards.name: Substitute

cards.name: Synergy Burst+

cards.name: Wonder Room+

relics.name: Burning Stick
relics.description:
In the hands of the Vixen, at the start of your turn, gain 1 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day.
Displays the amount of thevixenmod:Sunny_Day you have.

relics.name: Oran Berry
relics.description:
Once per combat, when you take unblocked attack damage while below 50% of your max HP, heal for 10% of your max HP.
Has 5 uses.
relics.flavorText: By tradition, these berries are harvested by brutally ripping out the trees they grow on.

relics.name: Synchronize
relics.description:
Whenever you are afflicted with Weak, Vulnerable or temporary Strengthloss, also apply it to the enemy that applied it.
(If you apply it to yourself, apply it to all enemies but for half the amount instead)

relics.name: Charcoal
relics.description: Damage caused by thevixenmod:Burn is doubled.

relics.name: Flame Orb
relics.description:
thevixenmod:Burn is now halved instead of removed at the end of turn.
Double the Block gained from the power thevixenmod:Guts.
relics.flavorText: You need real guts to carry something like this around.

relics.name: Shell Bell
relics.description: Whenever you deal damage to a thevixenmod:burned creature, gain 2 Block.
relics.flavorText: Reverberates when others scream in agony.

relics.name: Twisted Spoon
relics.description: Whenever your cards cause enemies to deal damage to themselves, they lose 2 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: Not to be confused with a strange spoon.

relics.name: Weakness Policy
relics.description: Whenever you are afflicted with a debuff unrelated to Strength or Dexterity, gain 2 Strength this turn.
relics.flavorText: If hit super effectively, please fill out form 37B and provide photographic proof of the event. NL A spire spokesperson will get back to you within 3 business days.

relics.name: Serene Grace
relics.description: Whenever you apply thevixenmod:Burn to an enemy, reduce that enemy's Strength by half the amount of thevixenmod:Burn applied until end of turn.

relics.name: Umbreon's Support
relics.description: After playing 20 cards, put Umbreon into your hand. It stays there until played or discarded manually.
relics.flavorText: Unbreakable bonds of friendship... that will be forgotten when you start another climb.

relics.name: Eternal Flame
relics.description:
Replaces Burning Stick. In the hands of the Vixen, at the start of your turn, gain 2 thevixenmod:Sunny_Day and gain Strength this turn equal to the leftover thevixenmod:Sunny_Day from last turn.
Displays the amount of thevixenmod:Sunny_Day you have.

relics.name: Firium Z
relics.description: Right-click: Once per combat, deal damage equal to all damage dealt to all enemies this turn to target enemy. It cannot die this turn.
relics.flavorText: Obtained in a fierce... dance competition.

relics.name: Choice Specs
relics.description:
After playing the first card each turn, you may only play cards of that cardtype until end of turn.
All Damage dealt, Block gained and HP healed is increased by 50%.
relics.flavorText: A rather tricky thing to use.
